CustomField.description: File Administration to utilize when an Account Request has been updated in SAP and/or Citi for the requested account changes. (i.e. Billing Address, Phone Number, SAP Account Created, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: File Administration to utilize when an Account Request has been updated in SAP and/or Citi for the requested account changes. (i.e. Billing Address, Phone Number, SAP Account Created, etc.)
CustomField.label: Sync with SAP
